proj-tag-names.description: A mapping of AWS project tags to the canonical project name

project-groups.description: Groups of projects which use common infrastructure, a mapping of group-name to list of projects in the group

accounts.description: The AWS accounts to be processed

billing-type.description: Whether costs should be split across multiple projects or assigned to a single project

project-tagname.description: The AWS tag name used for identifying project resources, required for billing-type=shared

project-groups.description: List of project-groups which share untagged costs, required for billing-type=shared

project.description: The project responsible for all costs, required for billing-type=project-specific
